item.title: add serverless cloud
item.description: https://www.serverless.com/cloud) - Serverless Cloud lets you build Serverless APIs, DBs and Storage by using infrastrucure _from_ code approach(no yaml, no infrastructure configuration - - Serverless Cloud lets you build Serverless APIs, DBs and Storage by using infrastrucure _from_ code approach(no yaml, no infrastructure configuration). The product is provided by Serverless Inc. and currently under public preview.
